qas.question: Who broadcasts the Premier League's games in the United States?

answers.text: The Premier League is broadcast in the United States through NBC Sports.

qas.question: What was the average viewership in the United States during the 2014-15 season?

answers.text: with NBC and NBCSN averaging a record 479,000 viewers in the 2014–15 season

qas.question: How many years did NBC Sports receive an extension for with the Premier League in 2015?

answers.text: NBC Sports reached a six-year extension with the Premier League in 2015

qas.question: What was the value of this extension?

answers.text: in a deal valued at $1 billion (£640 million).

context: <a0_0>The Premier League is broadcast in the <b13_0>United States<b13_0/> through <a5_0><b10_0>NBC Sports<b10_0/><a5_0/>.<a0_0/> Premier League viewership has increased rapidly, <a1_0>with NBC and NBCSN averaging a record <a7_0>479,000<a7_0/> viewers in the 2014–15 season<a1_0/>, up <a6_0>118%<a6_0/> from 2012–13 when coverage still aired on Fox Soccer and ESPN/ESPN2 (220,000 viewers), and NBC Sports has been widely praised for its coverage. <a2_0>NBC Sports reached a <b14_0>six-year<b14_0/> extension with the Premier League in <a8_0><b11_0>2015<b11_0/><a8_0/><a2_0/> to broadcast the league <a4_0>through the 2021–22 season<a4_0/> <a3_0>in a deal valued at <a9_0><b12_0>$1 billion<b12_0/><a9_0/> (£640 million).
